text: Nimen yingdang zhidao, jinshi de shenghuo, zhishi youxi, yule, dianzhui, jinkua, yi caichan he zisun de fushu xiang zhengsheng; piru shi yu, shi tianmiao zizhang, nongfu jianle feichang gaoxing, sihou, tianmiao kugao, ni kan ta bian cheng huangse de, ji'er lingluo.
